Shen Pretty Reckless Excerpt Prologue

“ Maybe [we]3865-we were never meant for [each other]3866-each other . But that night at [the carnival]3867-the carnival , when [you]3868-you showed [me]0-i who [you]3868-you were , [I]0-i figured out who [I]0-i wanted to be . ”[0-i] The most important thing [I]0-i ’d ever read was scribbled on the door of [a portable restroom]418-a portable restroom , engraved into plastic at [a carnival on [the outskirts of [Boston]1-boston]420-the outskirts of boston]419-a carnival on the outskirts of boston . Lust lingers , love stays . Lust is impatient , love waits . Lust burns , love warms . Lust destroys , but love ? Love kills . Maybe it was always [my]0-i destiny to fall in love with [a monster]421-a monster . When [other kids]422-other kids stayed awake at night fearing the pointy - toothed beast hiding in [[their]422-other kids closet]423-their closet , [I]0-i longed to see [mine]0-i . [I]0-i wanted to feed [it]424-it , domesticate it , understand it . [Sam]278-sam and [I]0-i were only allowed to love [each other]3866-each other in the dark . Once [our]426-our story unfolded , and the truth came to light , [I]0-i was [the one to cut the cord]427-the one to cut the cord . [My]0-i name is [Aisling Fitzpatrick]115-aisling , and [I]0-i have a confession to make . [Sam Brennan]278-sam is not the only monster in this story .

To monsters everywhere , and to sword - yielding [Pang]116-pang and [Jan.]117-jan. Thank [you]428-you for storming into [my]0-i life .

“ [You]428-you Are in Love with [a Psycho”—Kasabian[428-you] “ Rock & Roll Queen”—The[428-you] Subways]3869-a psycho”—kasabian “ rock & roll queen”—the subways “ [I]428-you ’m Not in [Love”—Kelsey[428-you] Lu “ Good Girls Bad Boys”—Falling]118-love”—kelsey lu “ good girls bad boys”—falling[428-you] in Reverse “ [Wow”—Zara[428-you] Larsson]119-wow”—zara larsson “ Listen Up”—The[428-you] Gossip “ The End of [the World”—Skeeter]3870-the world”—skeeter[120-davis] [Davis]120-davis

“ What would [an ocean]3871-an ocean be without a monster lurking in the dark ? It would be like sleep without dreams . ”[120-davis] — Werner Herzog

Age 9 This is the last time [you]428-you ever cry in [your]428-you life , shithead . That was the only thing that went through [my]0-i head when [the woman who gave birth to [me]0-i]429-the woman who gave birth to me punched the doorbell five times in a row , clutching the back of [my]0-i shirt like [she]429-the woman who gave birth to me was disposing of some punk who ’d TP’d [[her]429-the woman who gave birth to me house]430-her house on [[[her]429-the woman who gave birth to me neighbor]431-her neighbor ’s doorstep]432-her neighbor ’s doorstep . The door to [[Uncle Troy]121-troy ’s penthouse]433-uncle troy ’s penthouse swung open . [She]429-the woman who gave birth to me shoved [me]0-i past the threshold . “ Here . All [yours]0-i . [You]0-i win . ”[429-the woman who gave birth to me] [I]0-i flung [myself]0-i into the arms of [Aunt Sparrow]122-sparrow , who staggered backward , pulling [me]0-i to [her]122-sparrow chest in a protective hug . [Sparrow]122-sparrow and [Troy Brennan]123-troy were n’t really [[my]0-i aunt and [uncle]435-uncle]434-my aunt and uncle , but [I]0-i spent a lot of time with [them]434-my aunt and uncle — and by ‘ a lot ’ , [I]0-i mean still not enough . [Cat]124-cat , AKA [the woman who birthed [me]0-i]436-the woman who birthed me , was giving [me]0-i away . [She]124-cat ’d made up [her]124-cat mind tonight when [she]124-cat ’d passed by [me]0-i , on [her]124-cat way to [[her]124-cat bedroom]437-her bedroom . “ Why are [you]0-i so small ? [[Pam]125-pam ’s kid]3872-pam ’s kid is [your]0-i age , and [he]3872-pam ’s kid is , like , huge . ”[124-cat] “ Because [you]124-cat never fucking feed [me]0-i . ”[0-i] [I]0-i flung [my]0-i joystick to the side , giving [her]124-cat stink eye . “ [You]0-i ’re , like , ten or eleven , [Samuel]278-sam ! Make [yourself]0-i a sandwich . ”[0-i] [I]0-i was [a nine - year - old]438-a nine - year - old and [a malnourished one]439-a malnourished one at that . But [she]124-cat was right . [I]0-i should make [myself]0-i a sandwich . [I]0-i would if [we]440-we had the ingredients for it . There were n’t even condiments in [[our]440-we house]441-our house , only drug paraphernalia and enough booze to fill [the Charles River]2-the charles river . Not that [Cat]124-cat cared . [She]124-cat was blind with rage because [I]0-i stole [her]124-cat cocaine and sold it to [some wiseguys down [the street]443-the street]442-some wiseguys down the street then used the money to buy four McMeals and a Nerf gun , when [she]124-cat left [me]0-i unattended tonight . [Grandma Maria]126-grandma maria was [the one who did the heavy lifting when it came]444-the one who did the heavy lifting when it came to raising [me]0-i . [She]126-grandma maria lived with [us]440-we , working two jobs to support [us]440-we . [Catalina]127-catalina was in the background , like a piece of furniture . [There]445-there , but not really . [We]440-we lived under the same roof , but [she]127-catalina moved out whenever [[her]127-catalina boyfriends]446-her boyfriends were whipped enough to let [her]127-catalina stay with [them]446-her boyfriends . [She]127-catalina went to [rehab centers]447-rehab centers , and dated [married men]448-married men , and somehow had money to buy expensive bags and shoes . [Kids at [school]450-school]449-kids at school kept telling [me]0-i [[their]449-kids at school dads]451-their dads said [Cat]124-cat knew the curve of every mattress at [[our]440-we local Motel 6]452-our local motel 6 , and even though [I]0-i was n’t sure what it meant , [I]0-i was sure it was n’t good . [I]0-i once eavesdropped on [Uncle Troy]121-troy telling [her]124-cat , “ [He]121-troy is not [the fucking Hamptons]3873-the fucking hamptons , [Cat]124-cat . [You]124-cat ca n’t visit [him]121-troy periodically , when the weather allows it . ”[127-catalina] [Catalina]127-catalina had told [him]121-troy to shut [his]121-troy trap . That [I]0-i was the worst mistake [she]127-catalina had ever made while [she]127-catalina was high . That day , [I]0-i got expelled . Beat the shit out of [Neil DeMarco]128-neil demarco for saying [[his]128-neil demarco dad]453-his dad and [mom]454-mom were getting a divorce because of [[my]0-i mom]455-my mom . “ [[Your]128-neil demarco mom]3874-your mom ’s [a slut]3875-a slut , and now [I]0-i have to move to [a smaller house]3876-a smaller house ! [I]0-i hate [you]128-neil demarco ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i ’d given [him]121-troy a different reason to hate [me]0-i by the time [I]0-i was done with [him]121-troy , one [he]121-troy would always remember because it changed [his]121-troy face . When [Cat]124-cat picked [me]0-i up , [she]124-cat ’d yelled at [me]0-i that [she]124-cat ’d fuck up [my]0-i face like [I]0-i ’d done to [Neil]128-neil demarco , but [I]0-i was n’t worth breaking [her]124-cat new nails over . [I]0-i ’d barely heard [her]124-cat . Everything inside [my]0-i head was swollen from the fight and from thoughts that made [my]0-i head hurt . But [I]0-i knew [she]124-cat ’d be too cheap to take [me]0-i to [Urgent Care]3-urgent care , so [I]0-i did n’t complain . “ All ours ? ”[0-i] [Aunt Sparrow]122-sparrow narrowed [her]122-sparrow green eyes at [Catalina]127-catalina . “ What are [you]0-i talking about ? Today is not [our]3877-our day with [Sam]278-sam . ”[122-sparrow] [Aunt Sparrow]122-sparrow had red hair and freckles and a body like a scarecrow , all bones and skin . [She]122-sparrow was n’t as pretty as [Catalina]127-catalina , but [I]0-i still loved [her]122-sparrow more . [Cat]124-cat rolled [her]124-cat eyes , kicking the duffel bag with [my]0-i stuff . It hit [Uncle Troy]121-troy ’s shins . “ Do n’t pretend like [you]127-catalina have n’t been gunning for this all along . [You]127-catalina take [him]121-troy on [your]127-catalina family vacations , [he]121-troy has [a room [here]3879-here]3878-a room here , and [you]127-catalina go to all [his]121-troy soccer games . [You]127-catalina ’d breastfeed [him]121-troy if [you]127-catalina had any tits , which sadly , [you]127-catalina do n’t . ”[124-cat] [Catalina]127-catalina swiped [her]127-catalina eyes along [Sparrow]122-sparrow ’s body . “ [You]127-catalina always wanted [him]121-troy . [He]121-troy ’ll complete [[your]127-catalina boring little family]3880-your boring little family , with [[your]127-catalina boring little daughter]3881-your boring little daughter . Well , it ’s [your]127-catalina lucky day , because [the asshole]3882-the asshole is officially [yours]127-catalina . ”[127-catalina] [I]0-i swallowed hard and glared straight ahead at the flat screen TV behind [Sparrow]122-sparrow ’s shoulder . [[Their]456-their living room]457-their living room was a mess . The good kind of mess . Toys strewn everywhere , pink fluffy blankets , and a purple , glittery toddler scooter . [Brave]129-brave was playing on the screen . It was [Sailor]130-sailor ’s favorite movie . [She]130-sailor was probably asleep . [She]130-sailor had a bedtime . Rules . A routine . [Sailor]130-sailor was [Troy]121-troy and [[Sparrow]122-sparrow ’s two - year - old]458-sparrow ’s two - year - old . [I]0-i loved [her]130-sailor like [a sister]459-a sister . Whenever [she]130-sailor feared a monster was hiding under [her]130-sailor bed and [I]0-i was there , [she]130-sailor ’d slip out of [her]130-sailor toddler bed and pad into [[my]0-i room]460-my room and slide under [my]0-i blanket , clutching [me]0-i like [I]0-i was a teddy bear . “ Keep [me]130-sailor thafe , [Sammy]278-sam . ”[130-sailor] “ Always , [Sail]131-sail . ”[121-troy] “ Not in front of [the kid]3883-the kid . ”[121-troy] [Troy]121-troy stepped toward [Cat]124-cat , putting space between [her]124-cat and [me]0-i . [My]0-i stomach growled , reminding [me]0-i [I]0-i had n’t eaten since those McMeals [I]0-i ’d shoved down [my]0-i throat . “ [Sam]278-sam , can [you]278-sam give [us]3884-us a minute ? ”[122-sparrow] [Sparrow]122-sparrow ran [her]122-sparrow fingers through [my]0-i dusty hair . “ [I]122-sparrow got [you]278-sam that Ghost of Tsushima video game , like [you]278-sam asked . Grab a snack and play while [we]3884-us finish up [here]3879-here . ”[122-sparrow] [I]0-i took some beef jerky — [Uncle Troy]121-troy told [me]0-i protein would help [me]0-i grow taller — and disappeared into [the hallway]461-the hallway , rounding the corner but not getting into [[my]0-i room]460-my room . [I]0-i ’d had [[my]0-i own room]463-my own room [here]3879-here since [I]0-i was in first grade . [Grandma Maria]126-grandma maria said it was because [Troy]121-troy and [Sparrow]122-sparrow lived in [a good school district]465-a good school district , and [we]466-we needed [their]467-their zip code to register , but even after [I]0-i got expelled from [[my]0-i first school]468-my first school , [I]0-i still came [here]3879-here often . [[My]0-i “ real ”[0-i] house]470-my “ real ” house was in [a bad neighborhood in [Southie]4-southie]471-a bad neighborhood in southie , where tennis shoes littered [every power line]472-every power line , and even if [you]473-you did n’t pick fights , [you]473-you ’d sure as hell need to finish them in order to survive . [I]0-i liked how [he]121-troy said the word ‘ fuck . ’ The sound of it gave [me]0-i whiplash , and the skin on [my]0-i arms turned all funny . “ [Maria]126-grandma maria has barely been gone for three weeks , and [you]0-i ’re already pulling shady shit . ”[121-troy] [Grandma Maria]126-grandma maria passed away in [her]126-grandma maria sleep less than a month ago . [I]0-i was [the one who ’d found [her]126-grandma maria]474-the one who ’d found her . [Cat]124-cat had been out all night , “ working . ”[124-cat] [I]0-i ’d held [Grams]132-grams and cried until [I]0-i could n’t open [my]0-i eyes anymore . That [Grams]132-grams was too tired of [my]0-i bullshit and decided to bail . “ Ca n’t blame [her]124-cat for kickin ’ the bucket , [kid]3886-kid . [I]0-i ’d known [Cat]124-cat was n’t going to keep [me]0-i . “ First of all , watch [your]3886-kid mouth . [I]127-catalina ’m still grieving .
